channel.title: Comments on: Trader Joe’s Coconut Body Butter

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/trader-joes-coconut-body-butter/#comment-659">Christine Shari</a>.
HAHA!! Do you leave the lotion aisle with your nose all confused and itchy?! I do because I have to smell FREAKING EVERYTHING! It's an obsession! I hope you love that body butter. It's still one of my all time faves! Thanks so much for your comment! XO!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Christine Shari.

HAHA!! Do you leave the lotion aisle with your nose all confused and itchy?! I do because I have to smell FREAKING EVERYTHING! It’s an obsession! I hope you love that body butter. It’s still one of my all time faves! Thanks so much for your comment! XO!

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/trader-joes-coconut-body-butter/#comment-660">Angel</a>.
I'm going to look for that Argan oil body butter today! That sounds like it would be AHHHmazing!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Angel.

I’m going to look for that Argan oil body butter today! That sounds like it would be AHHHmazing!

item.description: I'm so fucking buying this! Me loves body butter. My fav body butter is c. Booth it's their Egyptian Argan Oil body butter. OMG it smells sexy, like BeyoncÃ© would smell........lol

item.title: By: Christine Shari
item.dc:creator: Christine Shari
item.description: OMFG.Your description about being a lotion killer is me all day. I READ EVERY LABEL. I read reviews as well as ingredients( actually how i found this post) looking for that perfect one. You've made my day knowing someone is just like me...awesome. and of course I'm completely sold and will be copping the coconut body butter from traders joes today.Also love the way you write. thanks :-)
item.content:encoded: OMFG.Your description about being a lotion killer is me all day. I READ EVERY LABEL. I read reviews as well as ingredients( actually how i found this post) looking for that perfect one. You’ve made my day knowing someone is just like me…awesome. and of course I’m completely sold and will be copping the coconut body butter from traders joes today.Also love the way you write. thanks ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/trader-joes-coconut-body-butter/#comment-494">Breda Fallon</a>.
HAHAHAHA! That policy is brilliant! I'm going to institute that rule in our house. Thanks for reading!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Breda Fallon.

HAHAHAHA! That policy is brilliant! I’m going to institute that rule in our house. Thanks for reading!

item.title: By: Breda Fallon
item.dc:creator: Breda Fallon
item.description:
We have a rule in our house that if you love something from Trader Joe's you have to loudly announce just the opposite. "Boy, I HATE this! I hope Trader Joe's stops making it FOREVER! It's horrible!" I am still not over the loss of my spicy biryani in a microwaveable pouch.
That said, I'm going to jinx myself and admit I love TJ's body butter, too. Especially the pumpkin one.
Thanks for such a great blog!
item.content:encoded:
We have a rule in our house that if you love something from Trader Joe’s you have to loudly announce just the opposite. “Boy, I HATE this! I hope Trader Joe’s stops making it FOREVER! It’s horrible!” I am still not over the loss of my spicy biryani in a microwaveable pouch.

That said, I’m going to jinx myself and admit I love TJ’s body butter, too. Especially the pumpkin one.

Thanks for such a great blog!

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/trader-joes-coconut-body-butter/#comment-474">Ci</a>.
Maybe a month? That's using it mostly every night.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ci.

Maybe a month? That’s using it mostly every night.

item.title: By: Ci
item.dc:creator: Ci
item.description: How long did it take you to finish the whole tub?
item.content:encoded: How long did it take you to finish the whole tub?

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/trader-joes-coconut-body-butter/#comment-312">Jess</a>.
Trading Places for the first time?!? What a blessed event!! I'm jealous! I always think about how I wish I could watch my favorite movies again for the first time. I hope you didn't get spoilered by my post. Also, that is some weeeeird synchronicity! Spooky!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jess.

Trading Places for the first time?!? What a blessed event!! I’m jealous! I always think about how I wish I could watch my favorite movies again for the first time. I hope you didn’t get spoilered by my post. Also, that is some weeeeird synchronicity! Spooky!

item.title: By: Jess
item.dc:creator: Jess
item.description: Want to hear something funny? I just opened up my first jar of the coconut body butter and decided to look up some info on it when I came across your posting. And I scroll down, I see the photos from Trading Places...the movie I am watching right now for the first time! By the way, I LOVE this stuff too!
item.content:encoded: Want to hear something funny? I just opened up my first jar of the coconut body butter and decided to look up some info on it when I came across your posting. And I scroll down, I see the photos from Trading Places…the movie I am watching right now for the first time! By the way, I LOVE this stuff too!
